altText: Tally the Cat, a fluffy multi-colored cat
description: Tally is the best cat ever. Don't believe any cat who claims otherwise.

altText: Tally staring thoughtfully through a window above a sign promising free info on Renters Rights at an event on November 15
description: Tally has known life on the streets, and she wouldn't wish that fate on anyone else. She is a strong proponent of renters' rights and an advocate for affordable housing.

altText: Tally sticking her face out of a box
description: Believe it or not, Tally is in this picture! She is great at hide & seek.

altText: Tally with her hind quarters on one level of a cat tree, and her front paws on the top level
Tally staring at the camera, laying on a beanbag looking very chill
description: Tally would like to know if maybe you wanna come over and watch a movie, you know, just chill?

altText: Tally reaching a paw out to caress the humidier
description: Tally has a best friend, and its name is The Humidifier.

altText: Tally laying on the ground right next to the humidifier, looking up at a puff of water
description: You thought I was kidding about the humidifier, didn't you?

altText: Tally sitting on a narrow shelf surrounded by beauty products that are about to fall off the shelf
description: Tally can find a comfy seat in basically any situation.
Tally loves hugs, especially when her human is on a video call for work. Tally and her human are best friends (though secretly, Tally prefers the humidifier).
